short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keeping the NFTs and Coins in your wallets safe from phishing attacks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Scams and phishing attacks has became prevalent on the internet. This chrome extension protects you and your friends while you navigate web3.

It shows you suspicious social media accounts you should watch out for, fradulent DApps you should not connect your wallet to, and scam NFT collections you should not mint.

Easily flag social media impersonators, scam NFTs and fraudulent DApps to help keep your friends safe
